alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 4:17PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central El Paso and north central Pueblo Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 417 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northeast of Penrose, or 21 miles northwest of Pueblo, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pinon and Pueblo West. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for southeastern and east central Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft
